# lcod://contract/core/number/trunc@1.0.0

Truncate a finite number toward zero.

## Inputs

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `value` | number | Yes | Number to truncate. |

## Outputs

| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `value` | number | Truncated integer. |
